DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
"""
{sequence
  - I like snow. Love it, even.
  - (Deep and crisp and even)
  - But my dog {wvy}LOVES {wvy}it. OMFG.
  - He could hop through it all day.
  - But he only has little legs.
  - And they hold the snow. Little snowballs clumping in the fur.
  - When we get home, it's bath and hairdryer time for him.
  - (Which he does not love).
  - But even with legs encased in snow, he doesn't want to go home
  - Because {wvy}SNOW{wvy}.
  - So, no, I don't love snow as much as my dog does.
  - But that's OK. He loves it enough for two.
  - {clr1}             {clr1}|{wvy}THE{wvy}|
    {clr1}             {clr1}|{wvy}END{wvy}|
  - 
}
"""

END 0
{

VAR a
42
